title: Morgan Evans Makes Red Carpet Debut With New Girlfriend After Kelsea Ballerini Divorce
shortdescription: Country singer steps out with Laci Kaye Booth at CMA Awards – ex Kelsea performing same night!
author: Gossip Guru

content.content: Three years after his very public divorce from Kelsea Ballerini, Morgan Evans just hard-launched his new romance with fellow country singer Laci Kaye Booth on the 2025 CMA Awards red carpet — the exact same night his ex was scheduled to perform.

The couple coordinated in black, with Laci wearing a plunging gown and Morgan beaming as he kept his hand on her lower back the entire time. Sources say they’ve been quietly dating for six months but chose country music’s biggest night to go official.

Insiders claim Ballerini found out about the debut just hours before hitting the carpet herself. She still delivered a flawless performance of her new single but skipped the press line entirely afterward.
